info.description: API for centralized API key management and service access control.
info.title: Pandora Core

post.description: Generates an API Key for a specific environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies the expiration date of a specific API key by ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password.

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Authenticates the administrator and returns a token.

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches a list of clients, optionally filtered by client type
get.summary: Retrieves all clients with optional filtering by type

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Adds a new client to the system

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific client using its ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies client data based on the provided ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches a list of projects associated with a given client
get.summary: Retrieves all projects for a specific client

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Adds a new environment to the system

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific environment using its ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies the details of a specific environment by ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Returns a list of API Keys associated with a specific environment
get.summary: Retrieves all API Keys for an environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Associates a service with a given environment
post.summary: Assigns a service to an environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

delete.description: Disassociates a service from a specific environment
delete.summary: Removes a service from an environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies the configuration of a service within a specific environment
patch.summary: Updates a service assigned to an environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Resets the available request count for a specific service within an environment
patch.summary: Resets request quota for a service in an environment

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Adds a new project to the system

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific project using its ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies the details of a specific project by ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches a list of environments associated with a given project
get.summary: Retrieves all environments for a specific project

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Associates a service with a given project
post.summary: Assigns a service to a project

default.description: Default error response for all failures

delete.description: Disassociates a service from a specific project
delete.summary: Removes a service from a project

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Modifies the configuration of a service within a specific project
patch.summary: Updates a service assigned to a project

default.description: Default error response for all failures

get.description: Fetches a list of all registered services

default.description: Default error response for all failures

post.description: Adds a new service to the system

default.description: Default error response for all failures

delete.description: Permanently removes a service by its ID

default.description: Default error response for all failures

patch.description: Changes the current status of a specific service by ID
patch.summary: Updates the status of a service

default.description: Default error response for all failures
